actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to provide for the removal of a barricade on abandoned Virginia Route 776 at Philpott Lake, Va.

summary.text: Directs the Chief of Engineers, Department of the Army, to remove a barricade on abandoned Virginia Route 776 at Salthouse Branch Recreation Area, Philpott Lake, Virginia.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the removal of a barricade on abandoned Virginia Route 776 at Philpott Lake, Va.
